description: DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCE HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR THE ITEMS DETAILED BELOW
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: HOSE ASSEMBLY, METALLIC
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-247814/A

##### Tender Status:
* Tender Status: **Expired**
* Tender Status (French): **Expiré**

**Notice Details**

* Solicitation Number: W8485-247814/A
* Publication Date: 2023-09-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-05T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2023-10-05
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-06
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: *General Defence*
* Notice Type (English): Request for Proposal
* Notice Type (French): Demande de propositions
* Procurement Method: Competetive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Solicitation Details**

* Solicitation Title: HOSE ASSEMBLY,METALLIC
* Solicitation Title (French): ENSEMBLE DE TUYAU, MÉTALLIQUE
* Description: "Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving unit, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any other method."
* Delivery: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at  7 CFSD Edmonton in December 2023.
* Items:
	1. GSIN: 4720, NSN: 4720-01-096-7416, HOSE ASSEMBLY, METALLIC
		* Part No.: 50C-0014-0170, NCAGE: 19062
		* Quantity: 30, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton.
	+ Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Contact Information**

* Contact Person: Dany Lebel
* Contact Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Telephone: (000) 000-0000
* Client:
	+ Client Name (English): DGAEPM
	+ Client Name (French): DGGPEA
	+ Address:
